pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================================daiquiri -- Python logging setup helper=======================================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/daiquiri.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/daiquiri :alt: Latest VersionThe daiquiri library provides an easy way to configure logging. It alsoprovides some custom formatters and handlers.You can read the whole documentation at http://daiquiri.readthedocs.io/* Free software: Apache license* Source: https://github.com/Mergifyio/daiquiri
